content: During Chapter 3, once you arrive at the North Shore of the Bitter Lake, you can fight an old dragon along the shore known as Chen Loong, who will then complain that his old bones are in need of medicine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shen_Monkey_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Shen Monkey Questline', specifically from the subsection 'In the the Zodiac Village'.
The content is as follows:
During Chapter 3, once you arrive at the North Shore of the Bitter Lake, you can fight an old dragon along the shore known as Chen Loong, who will then complain that his old bones are in need of medicine.
